column2: Forest, Agriculture, and Single Family Home District

column8: All proposed uses or structures are subject to Conditional Use review (public hearing) and conservation review standards. All proposals must demonstrate how land will be protected. Steep slopes must be reviewed for sewage, drainage and erosion contral. Developments on lots on or near wetlands must be set back 100' from wetland. 250' setback from critical wildlife habitat and natural areas. Areas above 2500' in elevation must provide protection of alpine ecosystems and sewage disposal systems.
